thread.title: 'Pyaar ka Punchnama 2’ gets a bumper opening
thread.title_full: 'Pyaar ka Punchnama 2’ gets a bumper opening

author: Deccan
title: 'Pyaar ka Punchnama 2’ gets a bumper opening
text: Deccan Chronicle | October 16, 2015, 18.47 pm Mumbai: The youth cult film, ‘Pyaar Ka Punchnama’ which released today has received a huge response from its beloved fans around the globe. The movie has opened well across the country and the theatres have had good advance booking for the weekend. The youth is all geared up to watch the movie. And when it comes to Mumbai, the morning shows had 50% occupancy, which is a very promising start. According to the trade insiders, the movie is estimated to collect approximately 6 crores and above on the first day in India. Overseas estimation is also looking to be promising. The film released in Dubai on 15th October, a day prior to its release in India.The estimated collection in Dubai is around 3 lakh Dirhams. These estimations have been living up to the expectation and clearly the movie is all set to ride high on a successful box office outing. The movie has released in approximately 1400 screens across India.
